meanings.definition: Of or relating to three dimensions.
meanings.sent1: The tridimensional shape of the cube made it look real.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a tridimensional sculpture that seemed to come to life.
meanings.sent3: The tridimensional puzzle was challenging but fun to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her tridimensional thinking allowed her to see things from multiple angles.
meanings.sent5: The tridimensional effect in the movie made the audience feel like they were part of the action.

meanings.sent1: The tridimensional object took up space on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The tridimensional model accurately represented the building's structure.
meanings.sent3: The tridimensional cake looked too good to eat.
meanings.sent4: His tridimensional drawing skills brought depth to the artwork.
meanings.sent5: The tridimensional nature of the map helped travelers navigate the terrain more easily.

meanings.sent1: The tridimensional world we live in is full of depth and space.
meanings.sent2: The tridimensional image popped out of the screen, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent3: The tridimensional glasses made everything look more real.
meanings.sent4: Her tridimensional perception of the problem allowed her to find a unique solution.
meanings.sent5: The tridimensional quality of the painting made it stand out among the rest.
